query.sql: SELECT sid, SUBSTR (program, 1, 19) program, substr(a.machine,1,20) machine, username, b.sql_id, child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, ROUND((elapsed_time/1000000)/decode(nvl(executions,0),0,1,executions),6) avg_etime, --ROUND(((elapsed_time/1000000)/decode(nvl(executions,0),0,1,executions)/3600),2) avg_htime, regexp_replace(sql_text, '[[:space:]]+',' ' ) sql_text FROM v$session a, v$sql b WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND username IS NOT NULL AND a.sql_id = b.sql_id AND a.sql_child_number = b.child_number ORDER BY status, username, program, sql_id
select sql_id , child_number as child , executions execs , ROUND(buffer_gets/decode(nvl(executions,0),0,1,executions),0) avg_lio , sql_text from v$sql s where sql_id = :SQL_ID order by 1,2
select sid , sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_exec_start from v$sql_monitor where sql_id = :SQL_ID order by 3 desc

SELECT NVL(s.username, '(oracle)') AS username, s.sid, s.serial#, se.event, se.total_waits, se.total_timeouts, se.time_waited/100 secs_waited, ROUND(se.average_wait/100,4) avg_wait, se.max_wait/100 max_wait --se.time_waited_micro FROM v$session_event se, v$session s WHERE s.sid = se.sid AND s.sid = :SID ORDER BY se.time_waited DESC

select owner, object_name, object_type, created, last_ddl_time, status from dba_objects where owner like upper(nvl(:owner, owner)) and object_name like upper(nvl(:obj_name, object_name)) order by 1,2,3
select * from dba_synonyms where synonym_name = :OBJECT_NAME and owner = :OWNER
select owner, view_name, text from dba_views where view_name = :OBJECT_NAME and owner = :OWNER

select sql_id , child_number , plan_hash_value plan_hash , executions execs , ROUND( (elapsed_time/1000000)/decode(nvl(executions,0),0,1,executions), 6) avg_etime , ROUND( buffer_gets/decode(nvl(executions,0),0,1,executions), 1) avg_lio , sql_text from v$sql s where upper(sql_text) like upper(nvl(:SQL_TEXT,sql_text)) and sql_text not like '%where upper(sql_text) like upper(nvl(%' and sql_id like nvl(:SQL_ID,sql_id) order by 1, 2, 3

SELECT substr(sql_text, 1) sql_text, parsing_schema_name, elapsed_time_delta / 1000 / 1000 AS elapsed_sec, stat.snap_id, to_char(snap.end_interval_time, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') AS snaptime, txt.sql_id, stat.plan_hash_value, stat.optimizer_cost FROM dba_hist_sqlstat stat, dba_hist_sqltext txt, dba_hist_snapshot snap WHERE stat.sql_id = txt.sql_id AND stat.snap_id = snap.snap_id AND stat.parsing_schema_name = nvl(:parsing_schema, stat.parsing_schema_name) AND dbms_lob.substr(sql_text, 200, 1) LIKE nvl(:sql_text, dbms_lob.substr(sql_text, 200, 1)) AND sql_text NOT LIKE '%where upper(sql_text) like upper(nvl(%' AND stat.sql_id LIKE nvl(:sql_id, stat.sql_id) AND elapsed_time_delta / 1000 / 1000 > nvl(:elapsed_time_secs, 0) AND snap.end_interval_time > ( sysdate - nvl(:days_history, 32) ) AND parsing_schema_name NOT IN ( 'SYS', 'SYSMAN', 'MDSYS', 'WKSYS' ) ORDER BY snaptime, txt.sql_id, stat.plan_hash_value

select ss.snap_id , ss.instance_number node , begin_interval_time , sql_id , plan_hash_value , nvl(executions_delta,0) execs , ROUND((elapsed_time_delta/decode(nvl(executions_delta,0),0,1,executions_delta))/1000000,6) avg_etime , ROUND((buffer_gets_delta/decode(nvl(buffer_gets_delta,0),0,1,executions_delta)),2) avg_lio from DBA_HIST_SQLSTAT S, DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT SS where sql_id = nvl(:SQL_ID,'b48x5d48ppbk4') and ss.snap_id = S.snap_id and ss.instance_number = S.instance_number and begin_interval_time > sysdate - 7 and executions_delta > 0 order by 1, 2, 3

SELECT sql_id, plan_hash_value, SUM(execs) execs, -- sum(etime) etime, ROUND(SUM(etime) / SUM(execs),6) avg_etime, ROUND(SUM(cpu_time) / SUM(execs),2) avg_cpu_time, ROUND(SUM(lio) / SUM(execs),2) avg_lio, ROUND(SUM(pio) / SUM(execs),2) avg_pio FROM ( SELECT ss.snap_id, ss.instance_number node, begin_interval_time, sql_id, plan_hash_value, nvl(executions_delta, 0) execs, elapsed_time_delta / 1000000 etime, ( elapsed_time_delta / decode(nvl(executions_delta, 0), 0, 1, executions_delta) ) / 1000000 avg_etime, buffer_gets_delta lio, disk_reads_delta pio, cpu_time_delta / 1000000 cpu_time, ( buffer_gets_delta / decode(nvl(buffer_gets_delta, 0), 0, 1, executions_delta) ) avg_lio, ( cpu_time_delta / decode(nvl(executions_delta, 0), 0, 1, executions_delta) ) avg_cpu_time FROM dba_hist_sqlstat s, dba_hist_snapshot ss WHERE sql_id = nvl(:sql_id, 'b48x5d48ppbk4') AND ss.snap_id = s.snap_id AND ss.instance_number = s.instance_number -- and executions_delta > 0 ) GROUP BY sql_id, plan_hash_value ORDER BY 5

WITH hybrid_sql AS ( SELECT DISTINCT s.sql_id FROM gv$sql_plan s INNER JOIN gluent_adm.offload_objects o ON ( s.object_owner = o.hybrid_owner AND s.object_name = o.hybrid_external_table) ) SELECT s.inst_id||': ('||s.sid||','||s.serial#||')' AS sess_inf , s.username||' ('||nvl(s.osuser,'Unknown')||')' AS user_inf , nvl(s.TYPE,'Unknown') AS type , nvl(substr(S.MODULE,1,15),'Unknown') AS prog_inf , p.spid AS os_pid , nvl(S.STATUS,'Unknown') AS status , to_char((sysdate - S.last_call_et / 86400),'DD-MM-RR HH24:MI') AS last_activity , round(S.last_call_et / 3600, 2) AS hrs_ago , nvl(s.SQL_ID,'Unknown') AS sql_id , nvl(s.PREV_SQL_ID,'Unknown') AS prev_sql_id , nvl(s.event,'Unknown') AS wait_event , s.seconds_in_wait AS sec_wt , round(p.pga_max_mem / 1024 / 1024, 2) AS pga_alloc_mb FROM gv$process p LEFT OUTER JOIN gv$session s ON ( p.addr = s.paddr AND p.inst_id = s.inst_id) INNER JOIN hybrid_sql h ON ( s.sql_id = h.sql_id OR s.prev_sql_id = h.sql_id) order by hrs_ago DESC

select sid , sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_exec_start , sql_text from v$sql_monitor where upper(sql_text) like upper(nvl(:SQL_TEXT,sql_text)) and sql_text not like '%where upper(sql_text) like upper(nvl(%' and sql_id like nvl(:SQL_ID,sql_id) order by 1, 2, 3

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT trunc(transaction_date, 'MM') AS month_begin,m_cat mycat,amount FROM cc_chase_swa where m_cat <> 'Payment' UNION SELECT trunc(transaction_date, 'MM') AS month_begin,m_cat mycat,amount FROM cc_aviator_aa where m_cat <> 'Payment' UNION SELECT trunc(transaction_date, 'MM') AS month_begin,m_cat mycat,amount FROM cc_discover where m_cat <> 'Payment' ) PIVOT ( SUM ( amount ) AS tot FOR ( mycat ) IN ( 'Home'as home, 'Gas' as gas, 'Work' as work, 'Food & Drink' as food, 'Entertainment' as ent, 'Bills & Utilities' as bills, 'Groceries' as groceries, 'Personal' as personal, 'Vacation' as vacation, 'Shopping' as shopping, 'Medical' as medical) ) ORDER BY month_begin
SELECT transaction_date, m_cat, m_desc, ROUND(amount,2) transaction , SUM(amount) OVER( ORDER BY trans_id ) AS balance FROM rick_home.nfcu_rick_checking ORDER BY trans_id desc
SELECT owner, object_name, object_type, created, last_ddl_time FROM dba_objects WHERE owner = :owner AND object_name like NVL(:object_name, object_name) ORDER BY 1, 2, 3

SELECT v.owner AS hybrid_owner , v.view_name AS hybrid_view , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("OBJECT_TYPE": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(128)) AS hybrid_view_type , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("EXTERNAL_TABLE": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS hybrid_external_table , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("HADOOP_OWNER": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(128)) AS hadoop_owner , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("HADOOP_TABLE": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(128)) AS hadoop_table , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("OFFLOAD_TYPE": ")(INCREMENTAL|FULL)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS offload_type , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("OFFLOADED_OWNER": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS offloaded_owner , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("OFFLOADED_TABLE": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS offloaded_table , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("INCREMENTAL_KEY": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS incremental_key , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("INCREMENTAL_HIGH_VALUE": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(256)) AS incremental_high_value , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("INCREMENTAL_RANGE": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(20)) AS incremental_range , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("OFFLOAD_BUCKET_COLUMN": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS offload_bucket_column , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("OFFLOAD_BUCKET_METHOD": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS offload_bucket_method , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("OFFLOAD_BUCKET_COUNT": )([0-9]+)', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(6)) AS offload_bucket_count , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("OFFLOAD_VERSION": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(20)) AS offload_version , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("OFFLOAD_SORT_COLUMNS": ")([^"]+)(")', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(512)) AS offload_sort_columns , CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(tc.comments, '("TRANSFORMATIONS": {)(.+?)("})', 1, 1, 'm', 2) AS VARCHAR2(1000)) AS transformations , tc.comments AS offload_metadata_json FROM dba_views v INNER JOIN dba_tab_comments tc ON ( tc.owner = v.owner AND tc.table_name = v.view_name ) WHERE tc.comments LIKE '%"OBJECT_TYPE": "GLUENT\_%\_VIEW"%' ESCAPE '\'
select owner , table_name ,comments from dba_tab_comments where comments like '%"OBJECT_TYPE": "GLUENT\_%\_VIEW"%' escape '\' order by owner, table_name

WITH tables AS ( SELECT /*+ materialize no_merge(dt) user_hash(dtp dts) */ dt.owner table_owner , dt.table_name table_name , dt.num_rows table_num_rows , dt.compression table_compression , dt.compress_for table_compress_for , dtp.partition_position partition_position , dtp.partition_name partition_name , dtp.high_value partition_high_value , dtp.num_rows partition_num_rows , dtp.compression partition_compression , dtp.compress_for partition_compress_for , dts.subpartition_position subpartition_position , dts.subpartition_name subpartition_name , dts.high_value subpartition_high_value , dts.num_rows subpartition_num_rows , dts.compression subpartition_compression , dts.compress_for subpartition_compress_for FROM dba_tables dt LEFT OUTER JOIN dba_tab_partitions dtp ON ( dtp.table_owner = dt.owner AND dtp.table_name = dt.table_name ) LEFT OUTER JOIN dba_tab_subpartitions dts ON ( dts.table_owner = dtp.table_owner AND dts.table_name = dtp.table_name AND dts.partition_name = dtp.partition_name ) WHERE dt.owner = UPPER( :TABLE_OWNER ) AND dt.table_name = UPPER( :TABLE_NAME ) ) , segments AS ( SELECT /*+ materialize no_merge(ds) */ ds.owner , ds.segment_name , ds.partition_name , ds.bytes FROM dba_segments ds WHERE ds.owner = UPPER( :TABLE_OWNER ) ) SELECT LPAD( TO_CHAR( NVL( t.partition_position, 0)), 7, '0') || '.' || LPAD( TO_CHAR( NVL( t.subpartition_position, 0)), 7, '0') position , t.table_owner table_owner , t.table_name table_name , t.partition_name partition_name , t.subpartition_name subpartition_name , COALESCE( t.subpartition_high_value, t.partition_high_value) high_value , COALESCE( t.subpartition_num_rows, t.partition_num_rows, t.table_num_rows) num_rows , COALESCE( t.subpartition_compression, t.partition_compression, t.table_compression) compression , COALESCE( t.subpartition_compress_for, t.partition_compress_for, t.table_compress_for) compress_for , s.bytes/1024 kilobytes FROM tables t INNER JOIN segments s ON ( s.owner = t.table_owner AND s.segment_name = t.table_name AND COALESCE( s.partition_name, s.segment_name) = COALESCE( t.subpartition_name, t.partition_name, t.table_name) ) ORDER BY position

select case when hybrid_view_type = 'GLUENT_OFFLOAD_HYBRID_VIEW' then 'drop view ' || hybrid_owner || '.' || hybrid_view || ';' || chr(10) || 'drop table ' || hybrid_owner || '.' || hybrid_external_table || ';' when hybrid_view_type = 'GLUENT_OFFLOAD_AGGREGATE_HYBRID_VIEW' then 'drop view ' || hybrid_owner || '.' || hybrid_view || ';' || chr(10) || 'drop table ' || hybrid_owner || '.' || hybrid_external_table || ';' || chr(10) || 'execute dbms_advanced_rewrite.drop_rewrite_equivalence( name => ''' || hybrid_owner || '.' || hybrid_view || ''');' else '-- unhandled hybrid_view_type: ' || hybrid_view_type end "STMT" FROM gluent_adm.offload_objects WHERE offloaded_owner = UPPER(:OFFLOAD_OWNER) AND offloaded_table = UPPER(:OFFLOAD_TABLE)

SELECT table_owner , table_name , partition_name , subpartition_name , to_char(num_rows,'FM999G999G999G999') num_rows , round(kilobytes / 1024 / 1024, 3) size_gb FROM ext_table_disco_size_details WHERE table_owner = nvl(:table_owner, table_owner) AND table_name = nvl(:table_name, table_name)
